question: India ranks World's __________ largest unbanked population as per the report of World Bank.
explanation: According to World Bank, India has 19 crore adults without a bank account, making it the world's 2nd largest unbanked population. India's adult population with a bank account has more than doubled to 80% since 2011. Jan-Dhan Yojana has brought an additional 310 million Indians into formal banking system by March 2018. China has world's largest unbanked population, followed by India & Pak.
